Title: Episode #1.3
Writer: Steven Knight (created by), Tom Hardy (created by), Chips Hardy (created by), Steven Knight
Actors: Donovan Louie, Evelyn Van Marle, Alfie Mackay, Ruby-May Martinwood
Plot: Delaney receives medical help from an unexpected source, before outwitting the East India Company, which turns its attentions to Delaney's new ally, Lorna.
